entities.name: CRUD Events (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
entities.content:
| No. | Button | JavaScript Function | Action Type | Description |
|-----|--------|-------------------|-------------|-------------|
| 1 | Edit | `cntSubmitBlockAction()` | `keiyakusakiEdit` | Edit customer information in contract |
| 2 | Delete | `cntSubmitBlockAction()` | `keiyakusakiDelete` | Delete customer information from contract |
| 3 | Register | `cntChkGijyutsusyaHaichi();cntClickRegister()` | `register` | Save contract information to database |

entities.name: Search Events (Search/Support)
entities.content:
| No. | Button | JavaScript Function | Action Type | Description |
|-----|--------|-------------------|-------------|-------------|
| 1 | Support | `cntComOpenCustomerTransitionSearch()` | `customerSearch` | Open popup for customer information search |
| 2 | Support | `cntDoKoujisyuruibui()` | `constructionTypeSearch` | Search for construction type and components |
| 3 | ... (Company Search) | `cntCoprationOpenCustomerSearch()` | `managementCompanySearch` | Search for management company |

entities.name: Print Events
entities.content:
| No. | Button | JavaScript Function | Action Type | Description |
|-----|--------|-------------------|-------------|-------------|
| 1 | Contract Print | `cntOutputExcel()` | `printContract` | Generate and print contract |
| 2 | Order Print | `syugouTyumonsyoOutputExcel()` | `printOrder` | Generate and print order form |
| 3 | Kitai Information Print | `doHalPrintOut()`, `doParoPrintOut()`, `doSpPrintOut()` | `printKitaiInfo` | Print expectation information from partner system |

entities.name: Navigation Events
entities.content:
| No. | Button | JavaScript Function | Action Type | Description |
|-----|--------|-------------------|-------------|-------------|
| 1 | Return | `cntSubmit()` | `returnAnken` | Return to contract list screen |
| 2 | Close | `javascript:window.close()` | `closeWindow` | Close current window |
| 3 | Cancel Update | `cntCancelUpdateSubmit()` | `cancelUpdate` | Cancel changes and restore original data |

entities.name: Overall Processing Workflow
entities.content:
```mermaid
sequenceDiagram
    participant User as User
    participant JSP as JSP Screen
    participant JS as JavaScript
    participant Form as HTML Form
    participant Action as Struts Action
    participant Service as Business Service
    participant DB as Database
    
    User->>JSP: Click button
    JSP->>JS: Trigger onClick event
    JS->>JS: Validate data
    JS->>Form: Submit form data
    Form->>Action: Send HTTP request
    Action->>Service: Process business logic
    Service->>DB: Execute database operation
    DB-->>Service: Return results
    Service-->>Action: Return processed data
    Action-->>JSP: Forward to next screen
    JSP-->>User: Display updated screen
```

entities.name: CRUD Processing Flow
entities.content:
```mermaid
flowchart TD
    A[Click Edit/Delete/Register] --> B{Validation}
    B -->|Pass| C[Submit Form]
    B -->|Fail| D[Display Error Message]
    C --> E[Action Processing]
    E --> F[Business Logic]
    F --> G[Database Operation]
    G --> H{Success?}
    H -->|Yes| I[Update Screen]
    H -->|No| J[Display Error]
    I --> K[Complete]
    J --> K
    D --> K
```

entities.name: Search Processing Flow
entities.content:
```mermaid
flowchart TD
    A[Click Support Button] --> B[Open Popup Window]
    B --> C[Display Search Form]
    C --> D[User Inputs Conditions]
    D --> E[Execute Search]
    E --> F[Display Results]
    F --> G[User Selects]
    G --> H[Update Main Form]
    H --> I[Close Popup]
    I --> J[Complete]
```

entities.name: Event Flow Mapping
entities.content:
| Event Type | Trigger | Process | Result |
|------------|---------|------------|--------|
| CRUD | Button Click | Form Submission → Action → Service → DB | Screen Update |
| Search | Button Click | Popup Window → Search → Selection | Form Update |
| Print | Button Click | Print Request → Document Generation → Download | File Download |
| Navigation | Button Click | Form Submission → Action → Screen Transition | New Screen |
